H0.text: Who is the father of the twin boys born to Brooke Mueller on 14 March 2009. Charlie Sheen

H1.text: Who is the father of the twin boys born to Brooke Mueller on 14 March 2009. Denise Richards' Ex-Partner

H2.text: Who is the father of the twin boys born to Brooke Mueller on 14 March 2009. Martin Sheen

H3.text: Who is the father of the twin boys born to Brooke Mueller on 14 March 2009. WINNING!

A4.text: In 2008, Mueller married actor Charlie Sheen, with whom she shares twin sons.

A5.text: On May 30, 2008, Mueller married actor Charlie Sheen, having been engaged since 2007.
